name: ColorShape
0:
”Alexa, ask Color Shape for a color and a shape.”
”Alexa, ask Color Shape to give me a color and a shape.”
”Alexa, ask Color Shape to tell me a color and a shape.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color shape
des:
When you want to start drawing but can't think of where to start, just ask Alexa for a color and a shape to help get you started. Just say, "Alexa, ask Color Shape for a color and a shape" and she will help give you some inspiration.

Alexa will choose a random color and shape for you, and if you don't like her suggestion, just say "no" and she will give you another random color and shape.

Have fun drawing!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
